name: DANCE with me or DIE
description:
Alpha version of the Dance With Me game. There, you'll need to avoid invisible enemy attacks by dancing with them - if it approaches, you'll need to push the right button to dance.

The Google Play Store App version will be available as soon as it gets revised and published.

- some known bugs:

Android Version have a bug where you need to press the button multiple times so it identifies that you danced with the right enemy and then count your points.

The game, when you pause, restarts the music.

Sometimes it takes really long for an enemy to appear.
